message_1: What is the frequency (in cm⁻¹) of the stretching vibration of the C=O bond in a molecule of acetone (CH₃COCH₃) observed in the infrared spectrum at 1715 cm⁻¹?
message_2: The frequency of the stretching vibration of the C=O bond in a molecule of acetone (CH₃COCH₃) observed in the infrared spectrum is given as 1715 cm⁻¹. Therefore, the frequency of the C=O bond stretching vibration is 1715 cm⁻¹.
